pl.edu.agh.iosr.brokers

Interface StockIndexProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStockIndexProvider, BankierStockIndexProvider, GoogleStockIndexProvider, SampleStockIndexProvider

    public interface StockIndexProvider
extends Runnable
    An interface for objects which provide StockIndex instances. It can be run synchronously (run method) or asynchronously (start, stop methods). StockIndexListener instance set up by setOnStockIndex will receive notifications upon arrival of a new StockIndex.

      void stop()
